mapper.insert:
insert into flower_shop.t_order(u_id, o_name, o_tel, o_address, o_notes, o_create_time, o_sum_price, o_status) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.oName}, #{entity.oTel}, #{entity.oAddress}, #{entity.oNotes}, #{entity.oCreateTime}, #{entity.oSumPrice}, #{entity.oStatus})

insert into flower_shop.t_order(u_id, o_name, o_tel, o_address, o_notes, o_create_time, o_sum_price, o_status) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.oName}, #{entity.oTel}, #{entity.oAddress}, #{entity.oNotes}, #{entity.oCreateTime}, #{entity.oSumPrice}, #{entity.oStatus})
on duplicate key update u_id = values(u_id) , o_name = values(o_name) , o_tel = values(o_tel) , o_address = values(o_address) , o_notes = values(o_notes) , o_create_time = values(o_create_time) , o_sum_price = values(o_sum_price) , o_status = values(o_status)
